name: State Shift
description:
State Shift is a sci-fi racing game set in the not so distant future. Where civilization is crumbling under the stress of the depletion of natural resources, a group of free spirits from around the world compete in illegal races at the most spectacular locations. There are no rules! State Shift boasts various single player modes (including an expansive career mode) and also features an adrenaline pumping ad-hoc multiplayer mode.
State Shift is a Racing video game published by Midas Interactive Entertainment released on March 8th, 2007 for the PlayStation Portable.
